name: get_current_time_within_a_timezone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_clock.
Tool description: An API to get the current time. REST Services that will return current date/time in JSON for any registered time zone.
API description: Fetch the current time within a specified timezone using the RapidAPI World Clock API.

time_zone.description: The timezone identifier for which to fetch the current time (see: https://www.timeanddate.com/time/zones/).
